overview: Bree Olson is the ultimate bootlegger! In the not-too-distant future, gas shortages spawn an illegal new fuel that not only powers your car, it jump-starts your libido! As corporate bigwigs battle swamp pirates over the invention, Bree and her sultry southern belles use their cunning and coozes to transport their liquid gold over state lines! See for yourself why it's better in the bayou!
title: Blackmarket Bayou
